author: dapplion
content: Can you remind me why we don't want to have direct penalties for not doing the sync committee duties?

author: dapplion
content: 2) Right now there is only an aggregate of all sync committee pubkeys in the state. I assume that's to allow consumers to follow updates consuming less bandwidth. Then a single sync committee member can invalidate the usefulness of that aggregate pubkey by not participating. Is that correct?

author: potuz
content: in both proposals that are currently involved on the topic there will be penalties for not participating
